Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when another 2 or more
"DB Saga" or "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category allies are on the
team*
- {passiveImg:once}ATK & DEF 82%{passiveImg:up_g} for 4 turn(s)
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
- "DB Saga" Category allies' ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)
*When attacking with 18 or more Ki*
- "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category allies' DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} (self
excluded)
*Per "DB Saga" Category ally on the team*
- Ki +1
- ATK & DEF 17%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit 7%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is another "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally
attacking in the same turn*
- ATK & DEF 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance of
becoming a Super Attack
- Medium chance of evading enemy's attack

5524.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Seductive Attack
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Chance of evading enemy's attack 
(including Super Attack) +30% for 1 turn and 
disables a single targeted enemy's action 
once within the turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when facing only 1 enemy, 
whose HP is 50% or more, or when all allies 
attacking in the same turn are Super Class 
"DB Saga" Category characters (once only)
